review: Easiest installation of any electronic product I've ever done.  I had this hooked up and was watching programming within minutes.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Continually freezes.  I even purchased a longer hdmi cable to get it away from the tv.  I would buy a Roku next time.  My Roku player always works.  Netflix works fine on Rku, but my Amazon prime freezes no matter what device I use.  I use Amazon prime primarily for the shipping not the video or music.
author: J. Edwards

review: Great product and it does what it says it can do with letting you watch such sites as Netflix and Hulu. The reason I gave it 4 stars was because it didn't get maxgo and crunchy roll just to name a couple of sites. This may come to amazon down the line, just don't know when and if it is already accessible then please someone let me know how to downloaded so I may watch it.
author: Eddie Gold)(:':('

review: It's ok I wish it had more channels
author: trey

review: Was a gift for my sister. Easy to use,  Quick install and portable from one room/tv to another.
author: Jaeklec
